overview: The Ancient Greeks enjoyed it so much they gave it a name: Pederasty. The relationship between an older, slightly more mature guy and a younger, less-experienced fellow. It’s a hot and horny theme that’s fully explored in director John Smith’s latest spunktastic offering, as a collection of thick-dicked studs show their twinkish counterparts what it means to be a cock-hungry boy in today’s world. Needless to say, those tight young ass-holes will NEVER be quite the same again!
title: Dads Fuck Lads
